title: _ValidateValidArchitecture in Linux.targets blocking Linux cross compile.
body:
Edit: Issue Recreated Under Microsoft/VSLinux, this one may be closed.

Hi all, 

For some month I started to use visual studio to compile a cross platform project, I juste have a little remark on this when building on ARM linux platform:

Steps to reproduce:

Create a C++ project for linux, with compiler for an Embedded ARM device hosted in a x86/x64 Linux machine.
Cannot compile until removing _ValidateValidArchitecture from DependsOnTargets attribute in CLCompile Target in Linux.targets

_ValidateValidArchitecture test architechture of target machin instead of target compiler.

Each update of Visual studio reenable _ValidateValidArchitecture.

Best regards,

Stéphane
